subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Television
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Spain’s 1-0 victory over the Netherlands in the World Cup final Sunday was seen by a combined 24.3 million viewers, making it the most-watched soccer game in the United States.
snippet: Spain’s 1-0 victory over the Netherlands in the World Cup final Sunday was seen by a combined 24.3 million viewers, making it the most-watched soccer game in the United States.
